title: Ranil willing to support a probe on allegations against Dr.Jayalath Jayawardena
content: Opposition Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe told Parliament today that the UNP would support the appointment of a Select Committee of Parliament to probe if its MP Dr. Jayalath Jayawardena had acted in contravention of his Parliamentary oath of office. “If there is an inquiry, we will support it”, Mr. Wickremesinghe said….
